message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $115. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be very happy with it.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to get a better deal.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you. How about $110?  It's a fair price considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my target price. How about $108? I'm willing to meet you halfway.
